title.native: ネトゲの嫁は女の子じゃないと思った?
title.romaji: Netoge no Yome wa Onnanoko ja Nai to Omotta?
title.english: And you thought there is never a girl online?

description:
The story centers on Hideki Nishimura, a young man who confessed to a person he thought was a girl online, only for that person to turn out to be a boy. He keeps this "black history" secret and swears to never to trust a "girl" online again. However, one day a girl online confesses to him, and it turns out she's actually a beautiful girl named Ako Tamaki. Ako cannot tell the difference between the online world and reality, and she is a loner who has trouble communicating. Hideki and his friends from his guild decide to work together to "correct" her.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: ถามหน่อยครับ คิดว่าเจ้าสาวผมในเกมออนไลน์เป็นผู้หญิงจริงหรือเปล่า?

tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Hikikomori
tags.description: Prominently features a character who withdraws from social life, often seeking extreme isolation.

tags.name: Rehabilitation
tags.description: Prominently features the recovery of a character who became incapable of social life or work.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Large Breasts
tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

node.description:
__Doujin Circle:__ Neko wa Manma ga Utsukushii

[Website](http://nekoman9.x.fc2.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekomanHisasi) | [Piapro](http://piapro.jp/hisasi) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/119045)

Former adult game scenario writer. He is a creator of cult classic Shizuku, Kizuato and To Heart.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/t_takahasi)
**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.

__Height:__ 150 cm

[Fanclub](https://www.gokinjolno.jp/) | [Blog](http://nanjolno.jugem.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nanjolno) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nanjolno/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFJORT2GGeNsKKLCf3BqSEQ)

She was the vocalist of the band fripSide and graduated in April 2022 with the fripSide Phase 2 Final Arena Tour. Likes cats, Final Fantasy XIV (even dubbed and sung the battle theme of Suzaku), and ramen.

**Non anime roles:**
- Soltina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Noise - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Topaz - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Shu - Arknights (VG)
- Junah - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Trigger - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YukaliHashimoto) | [Blog (jp)](http://blog.livedoor.jp/marianne_amplifier/)

She is a composer, arranger and synthesizer programmer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YukaliHashimoto) | [Blog (jp)](http://blog.livedoor.jp/marianne_amplifier/)

She is a composer, arranger and synthesizer programmer.

Shouko Fujibayashi is a Japanese lyricist and musician. Shouko has written the lyrics for many television series' theme songs as well as several theme songs for tokusatsu shows. Most recently, Fujibayashi has worked with Shuhei Naruse on the sountracks of Kamen Rider Den-O, Kamen Rider Kiva, and their films respectively. She also worked with BoA, Ken Hirai, Sowelu, Mikuni Shimokawa, Crystal Kay, Beni Arashiro, ISSA of DA PUMP, Lead and Miho Kanno. Shouko made her debut in 1995 with Wonderful Bravo, an image song for the anime TV series, Gokudou-kun. She works for Office Two-One.

__Height:__ 150 cm

[Fanclub](https://www.gokinjolno.jp/) | [Blog](http://nanjolno.jugem.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nanjolno) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nanjolno/) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFJORT2GGeNsKKLCf3BqSEQ)

She was the vocalist of the band fripSide and graduated in April 2022 with the fripSide Phase 2 Final Arena Tour. Likes cats, Final Fantasy XIV (even dubbed and sung the battle theme of Suzaku), and ramen.

**Non anime roles:**
- Soltina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Noise - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Topaz - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
- Shu - Arknights (VG)
- Junah - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Trigger - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

name.native: ルーチェ・トゥインクル・ウィンク

node.description: Alternate names: Tenchuu Girls Date of birth: Dec 30, 2012 Website Associates in Arc Jewel. Appeared as trainees of Lovely★Doll (愛乙女★DOLL) on December 30, 2012. The unit name changed to Love☆Ken (らぶ☆けん) on December 24, 2013. The unit was separated into two: Love☆Ken Luce and Love☆Ken Stella on February 2, 2014, and they were Love☆Ken Luce. The unit name changed to Luce Twinkle Wink☆ on May 23, 2014. The unit was also Tenchuu Girls (天誅ガールズ) from Black Bullet with dancer Kanami Sawaguchi (Tenchuu Green) and Seiyuu Erika Kaiho (Tenchuu Black), and participated Animelo Summer Live 2015 -THE GATE- on August 29, 2015 as backdancers of fripSide. The unit major debut via NBC Universal Entertainment Japan with Koiiro♡Shikoukairo on November 25, 2015. Members: Usami Yukino (Twinkle Pink) - was Tenchuu Pink from Tenchuu Girls Saori Itayama (Twinkle Water Blue) - was Tenchuu Blue from Tenchuu Girls Kaho Higaki (Twinkle Lavender) - originally from C-ZONE, was Rusuban Pink from Rusuban Girls and Tenchuu Violet from Tenchuu Girls Saki Fukasawa (Twinkle Red) - originally from coro☆coro with Saki Fukasawa, was Tenchuu Red from Tenchuu Girls Megumi Nishikiori (Twinkle Yellow) - originally from Hydrangea, was Tenchuu Yellow from Tenchuu Girls (Source: MAL)

__Twitter | Instagram__ __Kaoru Ookubo__ is a Japanese arranger, composer, musician, orechestrator and keyboardist. He is a part of the sound production studio Popholic. Once had the title "god of anison" in the mid-2000s.

__Twitter | Instagram__ __Kaoru Ookubo__ is a Japanese arranger, composer, musician, orechestrator and keyboardist. He is a part of the sound production studio Popholic. Once had the title "god of anison" in the mid-2000s.

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 1 - And you thought there is never a girl online?
Episode 2 - I thought we couldn't play net games at school?
Episode 3 - I thought net games and reality were different?
Episode 4 - I thought her secret wasn't going to get out?
Episode 5 - I thought reincarnating would give me my big chance?
Episode 6 - I thought if I declared my love, I was sure to succeed
Episode 7 - I thought if I went to the beach, I would become a normie?
Episode 8 - I thought I was giving up being a net game husband?
Episode 9 - I thought if we stayed over, we would get along better?
Episode 10 - I thought we would do our best at the culture festival?
Episode 11 - I thought we could win by delegating to others?
Episode 12 - My net game wife is a girl online!
